hero.title: Take Control of Your Finances with Confidence

features.title: Everything You Need to Stay Financially Organized
features.subtitle: Powerful features designed to give you complete visibility and control over your financial commitments.

paymentTracking.title: Smart Payment Tracking
paymentTracking.description: Monitor all your payments with color-coded status indicators. Instantly see what's pending, due today, or overdue at a glance.

dueDateAlerts.title: Intelligent Due Date Alerts
dueDateAlerts.description: Never miss a payment deadline. Get automated reminders and notifications so you're always ahead of your due dates.

financialOverview.title: Visual Financial Dashboard
financialOverview.description: Beautiful charts and insights showing your income, expenses, and spending trends. Make informed decisions with data at your fingertips.

qrBills.title: Swiss QR Bill Integration
qrBills.description: Scan Swiss QR bills to auto-fill transaction details instantly. No more manual data entry for your Swiss payments.

installments.title: Flexible Installment Plans
installments.description: Break large expenses into manageable monthly payments. Automatically track each installment with individual due dates.

paymentSessions.title: Guided Payment Sessions
paymentSessions.description: Step through unpaid expenses systematically. Mark payments as completed in an organized, stress-free workflow.

howItWorks.title: Get Started in Three Simple Steps
howItWorks.subtitle: From setup to full financial clarity in minutes. Our intuitive process makes money management effortless.

step1.title: Add Your Transactions
step1.description: Start by adding your income and expenses. Use our quick manual entry or scan Swiss QR bills for instant data capture.
step1.feature2: Swiss QR bill scanner for instant capture
step1.feature3: Support for one-time payments and installments

step2.title: Track Everything Visually
step2.description: Your dashboard shows exactly what's paid, pending, or overdue. Color-coded cards and charts make financial status instantly clear.
step2.feature3: Filter by billing period or payment type

step3.title: Stay in Control
step3.description: Get alerts before due dates and use payment sessions to work through bills systematically. Never lose track of your finances again.

pricing.title: Choose the Plan That Fits Your Needs
pricing.subtitle: Start free and upgrade as your financial tracking needs grow. All plans include our core features.
